text: Samantha Reeves (born January 17, 1979) is an American tennis player. Reeves's best results in singles have been reaching the quarter-finals at Hawaii (2002), Bahia and Quebec City (2001). ==WTA finals== ===Doubles (2–1)=== {| |-valign=top | {| class="wikitable sortable
